text: George Herman Spriggs (May 22, 1937 â€“ December 22, 2020) was an American outfielder in Major League Baseball. He played for the Pittsburgh Pirates and the Kansas City Royals in parts of four seasons from 1965 to 1970. Spriggs was born on a highway in Anne Arundel County, Maryland. Spriggs died on December 22, 2020 in Prince Frederick, Maryland at the age of 83.George Herman Spriggs ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Pittsburgh Pirates players Category:Kansas City Royals players Category:Sportspeople from Maryland
title: George Spriggs (baseball)
